import React from "react"; import "../styles/BrandsGrid.css"; /** * Example usage: * * * Replace the `logo` paths with your real /public paths. */ const BRANDS = [ { key: "maruti", name: "Maruti Suzuki", count: "320+ cars", logo: "/brands/maruti.png" }, { key: "hyundai", name: "Hyundai", count: "230+ cars", logo: "/brands/hyundai.png" }, { key: "honda", name: "Honda", count: "130+ cars", logo: "/brands/honda.png" }, { key: "tata", name: "Tata", count: "120+ cars", logo: "/brands/tata.png" }, { key: "kia", name: "Kia", count: "70+ cars", logo: "/brands/kia.png" }, { key: "renault", name: "Renault", count: "60+ cars", logo: "/brands/renault.png" }, { key: "ford", name: "Ford", count: "40+ cars", logo: "/brands/ford.png" }, { key: "mahindra", name: "Mahindra", count: "30+ cars", logo: "/brands/mahindra.png" }, { key: "skoda", name: "Skoda", count: "30+ cars", logo: "/brands/skoda.png" }, { key: "vw", name: "Volkswagen", count: "20+ cars", logo: "/brands/volkswagen.png" }, { key: "toyota", name: "Toyota", count: "20+ cars", logo: "/brands/toyota.png" }, { key: "spinnyMax", name: "Spinny MAX", count: "", logo: "/brands/spinnym.png" }, ]; export default function BrandsGrid({ brands = BRANDS, onViewAll, onBrandClick }) { return (

Explore Popular Brands

{brands.map((b) => ( ))}
); }
